sentences: Tim van Eyken (born 7 March 1978) is an English guitarist and melodeon player of Belgian descent.
He first came to prominence in 1998 when he won the BBC Radio 2 Young Folk Award.
In 2000 he was invited to become the fourth member of Waterson–Carthy, a position he held until May 2007.
In 2008 he appeared at the National theatre in War Horse by Michael Morpurgo.
